patient_name.description: Page 1: Row labeled 'Patient name'. Copy EXACTLY as written (handwritten).

nrc_or_passport.description: Page 1: Row labeled 'NRC/passport'. Copy EXACTLY as written. Do not reformat. If value is redacted/masked/blackened/blurred (e.g., 'XXXXXX' or hidden), return empty string.

employer_name.description: Page 1: Row labeled 'Name of employer'. Copy EXACTLY as written. If blank, return "".

appointment_or_admission_date.description: Page 1: Row labeled 'Appointment/Admission date'. Copy EXACTLY as written (keep punctuation like '.' or '/'). Do not normalize.

member_signature_section.description: Page 3: 'Signature of a member (Individual Life Insured)' + 'Name of a member (Individual Life Insured)' + 'Date'. This is the member/insured signature section.

member_signature_text.description: Page 3: Signature of a member (Individual Life Insured). If only a drawn signature, return "Signed". If empty, return "".

member_name.description: Page 3: Name of a member (Individual Life Insured). Copy EXACTLY as written (can be Burmese).

member_signature_date.description: Page 3: Date field beside member signature section. Copy EXACTLY as written (e.g., '19.11.2024'). Do not normalize.

patient_name.description: Part (1) patient info table: Patient name (handwritten). Copy exactly as written.

policy_no.description: Part (1) patient info table: Policy number / Member number. If the field is blank or not present, return empty string.

nrc_or_passport.description: Part (1) patient info table: NRC / Passport number. Copy exactly as written. If redacted/masked/blackened/blurred or unreadable, return empty string.

date_of_birth.description: Part (1) patient info table: Date of birth. Copy exactly as written (do not normalize format).

admission_or_appointment_date.description: Part (1) patient info table: Admission/Appointment date (the row where the sample shows 19.11.2024). Copy exactly as written.

hospital_name.description: Part (1) patient info table: The row after date fields that records hospital/clinic/provider (label is Burmese). Copy exactly what is written in that row. Do NOT take values from adjacent rows (doctor name, Ward/Township). If text looks like job status (e.g., 'On duty'), it belongs to occupation, not hospital_name. If blank/unclear, return empty string.

doctor_name.description: Part (1) patient info table: This mapped field corresponds to the duty/occupation style row under provider/hospital in this form variant. Copy exactly what is written in that row (example: 'On duty'). Do NOT copy from hospital/clinic/provider row (example: 'Ar Yu'). If blank, return empty string.

ward_or_township.description: Part (1) patient info table: Ward / Township / locality (row label includes 'Ward' and 'Township'). Copy exactly as written. If blank, return empty string.

email.description: Part (1) contact section: Email address. Copy exactly (keep punctuation, @, dots). If blank, return empty string.

phone_number.description: Part (1) contact section: Phone number. Copy exactly as written (do not reformat). If blank, return empty string.

representative_declaration.description: Page 2 (top table): This section is for a representative signing on behalf of the member/patient. DO NOT mix with the 'member (Individual Life Insured)' signature section on Page 3.

signature_present.description: Set true if any representative signature/handwriting appears in the signature cell; otherwise false.

representative_signature_text.description: Page 2: Representative signature cell. If it is only a drawn signature (not readable letters), return "Signed". If readable words exist (e.g., 'on behalf of'), copy EXACTLY. If empty, return "".

representative_on_behalf_text.description: Page 2: Any explicit 'on behalf of' / representative note near the signature area. Copy EXACTLY. If none, return "".

representative_name.description: Page 2: Name written in the lower-left name cell of the table (below the representative signature row). This is the representative/signer name. Copy EXACTLY. If blank, return "".

representative_signature_date.description: Page 2: Date written in the right-most date cell. Copy EXACTLY as written (e.g., '19/11/24'). Do not normalize.

condition_related_cosmetic_dental.description: Cosmetic reason/Dental care/Refractive errors correction related (Yes/No).

symptom_onset_date.description: Estimated date of onset of symptoms.

outpatient_manageable.description: D. Can the condition be managed under Outpatient basis?

yes.description: True if YES checkbox is visibly ticked.

no.description: True if NO checkbox is visibly ticked.

outpatient_reason_if_yes.description: If YES, reason for hospitalisation. Empty string if blank or not applicable.

previous_consultation_or_hospitalization.description: E. Any previous consultation/treatment/hospitalisation related to this condition.

previous_reports_required_note.description: Optional note if form states to provide previous medical reports. Usually static text or blank.

surgery_or_procedure_name.description: F. Name of surgery or procedure if applicable.

estimated_length_of_stay.description: G. Estimated length of stay in hospital (e.g., '3 days', '1 week').

injury_accident_datetime.description: I. Date and time of accident if hospitalisation due to injury.

injury_circumstances_and_cause.description: I. Circumstances and cause of injury.

additional_attachments.description: J. Additional attachment listed (medical record, referral letter, police report, biopsy report, etc).
